definition: iron panel/hot iron plate for fast grilling (Japanese: teppan)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious
fillet beef served sizzling on a hot iron plate
beef grilled on a hot iron plate
eggplant served sizzling on a hot iron plate

sentences.english: This is my first time to eat teppanyaki.
sentences.chinese: 這是我第一次喫鐵板燒。

sentences.english: Why don't we go for Teppanyaki tonight?
sentences.chinese: 我們晚上去喫鐵板燒怎麼樣？

sentences.english: Screw in the vertical can also increase overall plate shields.
sentences.chinese: 在縱向絲槓上也可加整體鐵板防護罩。

sentences.english: Preheat waffle iron to medium high.
sentences.chinese: 將華夫鐵板調至中溫預熱。

sentences.english: If you do not have a waffle iron, just use a fry pan and cook like a pancake.
sentences.chinese: 若沒有華夫鐵板，可用煎鍋代替，象做薄烤餅那樣。

sentences.english: All the house were of wood with red-painted iron roofs.
sentences.chinese: 房子全是木製的，房頂有刷有紅漆的鐵板製成。

sentences.english: Baked chicken one night can become fajitas the next night.
sentences.chinese: 過夜的烤雞可以加工成次夜的墨西哥鐵板燒。

sentences.english: People should remember that our proposals aren't carved in stone.
sentences.chinese: 人們應該記住我們的建議並非鐵板釘釘。

sentences.english: We went to a teppanyaki restaurant where they cook in front of you.
sentences.chinese: 我們去了一家有專人爲你現場烘烤的鐵板燒餐廳。

sentences.english: The experience with improvement of the foundry method for a plate shaped nodular iron casting with weight of 1000kg was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹質量1噸的球鐵板形鑄件的鑄造工藝改進經驗。

sentences.english: Iron board flaps the concrete pavement, emitting jingling discord.
sentences.chinese: 鐵板拍打水泥路面的聲音，嘈雜刺耳。

sentences.english: You’d think security would be a one-size-fits-all thing.
sentences.chinese: 你會認爲安保措施肯定是鐵板一塊的東西。

sentences.english: They would then slowly score the bunk, over and over, gradually etching out the shape of a blade.
sentences.chinese: 他們再用這個慢慢劃鐵板，漸漸切出匕首的形狀。

sentences.english: Tapping screws, Pan head, Phillips or Pozi drive, zinc or black phosphated.
sentences.chinese: 鐵板牙螺絲，平頭，十字槽，鍍鋅或磷化黑色。

sentences.english: It is also significant that theocracy is not monolithic either.
sentences.chinese: 很重要的一點是，神權政治並非鐵板一塊。

sentences.english: The hull's iron plates deep below the waterline were hit by torpedos.
sentences.chinese: 喫水線下的船身鐵板被魚雷擊穿。

definition: (of alcohol) to go to one's head/(old) (of a bride-to-be) to bind one's hair into a bun/(of a prostitute) to receive a patron for the first time
above/on top of/on the surface of
tempura/deep-fried cooking/also called 甜不辣[tian2 bu4 la4]
belt/band/ribbon/strap/girdle/(coll.) audio or video tape/Farrer's scallop (Chlamys farreri)/comb pen shell (Atrina pectinata)
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
